post_message: Kurt Cobain appears on the cover of our latest issue, on newsstands today. In a 1994 feature, David Fricke looks back at the Nirvana frontman's music and legacy. "As a man of riffs and letters, Cobain was a sly dog who rarely stooped to the obvious…nothing in Cobain's music was ever quite what it initially seemed; his best-known song was named after a deodorant," Fricke wrote.
